channel.title: Runescape.jar decompiling
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I tried to extract and decompile the runescape.jar, to edit some stuff in it. But with every decompiler it gives 100+ errors :/ I know it's possible cuz various bot makers are doing it after every update to add hooks.
Can someone help me how to decompile runescape.jar?

item.title: Runescape.jar decompiling
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

wat. why using java agent then?

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape.jar decompiling
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:9, topic:394069”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=491255.msg3599738#msg3599738 date=1305448644]
bots? everyone is making keyloggers
[/quote]

this.

Though I have actually looked into botting using an agent, but the problem lies with grabbing the instance of the applet to push the events onto. I have several hooks inserted in the client to update my log with things such as login index change and public-chat events.[/quote]I just reflect the fields instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape.jar decompiling
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

frank_:

bots? everyone is making keyloggers

this.

Though I have actually looked into botting using an agent, but the problem lies with grabbing the instance of the applet to push the events onto. I have several hooks inserted in the client to update my log with things such as login index change and public-chat events.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape.jar decompiling
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:394069”][quote author=supyap link=topic=491255.msg3592450#msg3592450 date=1304753996]
Hi guys,

I tried to extract and decompile the runescape.jar, to edit some stuff in it. But with every decompiler it gives 100+ errors
I know it’s possible cuz various bot makers are doing it after every update to add hooks.

Can someone help me how to decompile runescape.jar?
[/quote]

You don’t decompile it. You use a bytecode library (BCEL or ASM are the most popular) to inject your code, and recognize bytecode patterns for whatever you want to hook, then when you’re done you save the modified classes.

Although, it seems it’s becoming increasingly popular to use a java agent instead.[/quote]
Using a java agent gives you the bytes of the class to create a ClassNode/ClassGen from

Read full topic

I know it’s possible cuz various bot makers are doing it after every update to add hooks.

Can someone help me how to decompile runescape.jar?[/quote]

You don’t decompile it. You use a bytecode library (BCEL or ASM are the most popular) to inject your code, and recognize bytecode patterns for whatever you want to hook, then when you’re done you save the modified classes.

Although, it seems it’s becoming increasingly popular to use a java agent instead.
